title: Play video on Dreambox
name: playvideoondreambox
description:
Plays videos on the Dreambox satellite receiver.

Open a video webpage like youtube and press the dreambox play button.

Requires the 'youtube-dl' executable to extract video URLs.
author: Christian Weiske (http://cweiske.de/) <cweiske@cweiske.de>
